message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_NO_QUESTION_ANSWERED_FOR_COMPLETE_DETERMINATION
message.locale: Answers have not been provided to any of the questionnaires. You must provide some answers in order to complete the determination.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_NO_QUESTION_ANSWERED_FOR_COMPLETE_ASSESSMENT
message.locale: Answers have not been provided to any of the questionnaires. You must provide some answers in order to complete the assessment

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_NO_QUESTION_ANSWERED_FOR_MAKE_DECISION
message.locale: Answers have not been provided to any of the questionnaires. You must provide some answers in order to make decisions.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ALL_MANDATORY_QUESTIONNAIRES_NOT_ANSWERED_FOR_COMPLETE_ASSESSMENT
message.locale: The following questionnaires are mandatory and have not been answered. You must answer these questionnaires before decisions can be made to complete the assessment: %1s

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ALL_MANDATORY_QUESTIONNAIRES_NOT_ANSWERED_FOR_MAKE_DECISION
message.locale: The following questionnaires are mandatory and have not been answered. You must answer these questionnaires before decisions can be made: %1s

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ALL_MANDATORY_QUESTIONNAIRES_NOT_ANSWERED_FOR_COMPLETE_DETERMINATION
message.locale: The following questionnaires are mandatory and have not been answered. You must answer these questionnaires before decisions can be made to complete the determination: %1s

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_NO_ANSWER_SELECTED_FOR_CONSOLIDATION
message.locale: The following questions do not have an answer selected.You must select and answer for these questions before decision can be made: %1d

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_NO_QUESTIONS_ANSWERED_FOR_QUESTIONNAIRE
message.locale: No Answers have been entered for this questionnaire.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_DETERMINATION_ASSESSMENT_NOT_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this %1s has been %2s

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_DETERMINATION_COMPLETED
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this determination has been completed.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_DETERMINATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this determination has been canceled.
Questionnaires cannot be answered as this determination has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_DETERMINATION_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this determination has been superseded.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ASSESSMENT_COMPLETED
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this assessment has been completed.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ASSESSMENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this assessment has been canceled.
Questionnaires cannot be answered as this assessment has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ASSESSMENT_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: Questionnaires cannot be answered as this assessment has been superseded.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_CONSOLIDATED_ANSWER_NOTE
message.locale: Note:Editing consolidated answers will remove the consolidation.

message.name: ERR_QUESTION_ANSWER_ANSWERS_RECORDED_SUCCESSFULLY
message.locale: Answers have been recorded successfully.
